name: gitlab-mwe
description: GitLab Docker Environment for development with cost-optimized Codespaces support

scripts.start: echo '🚀 启动GitLab环境...' && docker compose up -d
scripts.stop: echo '⏹️  停止GitLab环境...' && docker compose down
scripts.restart: echo '🔄 重启GitLab环境...' && docker compose restart
scripts.cleanup: echo '🧹 清理Docker资源以节省空间...' && docker system prune -f
scripts.gitlab:password: echo '🔑 获取GitLab初始密码:' && sudo cat config/initial_root_password 2>/dev/null || echo '密码文件不存在，请先启动GitLab服务'
scripts.help:
echo '
📖 可用命令:
  npm run start     - 启动GitLab环境
  npm run stop      - 停止GitLab环境
  npm run restart   - 重启GitLab环境
  npm run logs      - 查看所有服务日志
  npm run status    - 查看服务状态
  npm run cleanup   - 清理Docker资源
  npm run gitlab:password - 获取GitLab初始密码

💡 提示: 使用完毕后请执行 npm run stop 以节省Codespaces资源
'

author: Musicminion
